title: Real-time Collaboration Tool Using WebSockets
description:
Develop a real-time collaboration tool using WebSockets, allowing multiple users to edit documents simultaneously. Implement features such as live document updates, user cursors, chat functionality, and version control. Use technologies like Flask for the backend and WebSocket libraries for bidirectional communication.

Features:

Real-time Document Editing
User Cursors and Presence Indicators
Chat Functionality
Version Control and Revision History
User Authentication and Permissions
Outcome:
By building this project, you'll gain expertise in WebSocket communication, real-time collaboration, version control systems, and user authentication, while also improving your backend development skills.
